data.comment: The match is underway. Antwerp have kicked-off.
Lior Refaelov heads in to make it 1-0 at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 45, Bram Van Driessche blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Liege with the kick-off.
Abdoul Tapsoba is on a sub for Aleksandar Boljevic for Liege.
In the minute 68, Goal! Liege draw level to 1-1 through a Maxime Lestienne header.
Antwerp make their first substitution with Nana Opoku Ampomah replacing Simen Juklerod.
Aurelio Buta is replacing Koji Miyoshi for the home team.
In the minute 74, At Bosuilstadion, Abdoul Tapsoba has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Nicolas Raskin is booked for the away team.
Philippe Montanier is making the team's second substitution at Bosuilstadion with Damjan Pavlovic replacing Maxime Lestienne.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Hugo Siquet with Laurent Jans.
Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a third substitution, with Cristian Benavente replacing Pieter Gerkens.
The match has come to a close in Antwerp. The final score is 1-1.
Damjan Pavlovic for Liege has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
